response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. The value of this product to me is substantial, and I am eager to share its benefits with you.

After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, which reflects my desire to find it a worthy owner who will appreciate its true worth.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
